chinese: ad），有活力的，有生气的 n.动力
这位年轻的女士精力充沛，充满活力。
english: This young lady is very dynamic and full of energy

chinese: n.<英>汽油
司机说：“麻烦给我的车加满油！”
english: Please fill my car up with petrol

chinese: n.【热量单位】卡，卡路里
吃东西之前，我需要计算一下每种食物所含的卡路里。
english: I calculate the calorie of my food before I take meals

chinese: .鞭打；猛烈抨击；捆绑；摆动 D.鞭便 梢；鞭打
农夫用鞭子抽打牛来让它加速。
english: The farmer lashed the cattle to speed him up

chinese: V口译；解释；把…⋯理解为
我把他的话口译成了英文。
english: I interpreted his words into English

chinese: adj.典型的，有代表性的
她为她的朋友准备了一顿典型的法国餐。
english: She prepared a typical French meal for her friend

chinese: n.干旱，旱灾
干旱使土地彻底干裂。
english: The drought has completely dried out the land

chinese: adj.虚伪的
女孩刚走，这个男孩就把礼物扔进了垃圾桶，这可真虚伪。
english: It was hypocritical of the boy to throw the gift into the dustbin the instant the girl left

chinese: n.审判，审理；考验 ad）.试验的，试验性的
负责此次审判的法官正在听取律师发言。
english: The judge in charge of the trial is listening to the lawyers

chinese: Vt，消费，用尽
人们在消费时会使用信用卡。
english: A credit card is used when people expend money

chinese: adv：很少，难得
成都很少下雪。
V 交流，互动；互相作用，互相影响
表演过程中，这位美丽的舞者与观众牵手互
english: During the performance, the beautiful dancer interacted with the audience hand in hand

chinese: v.倒置；倒转；颠倒
在使用之前，茶杯都是倒置在桌子上的。
english: Tea cups are inverted on the table before they're used

chinese: n.赛马的骑师
两位赛马的骑师正为嬴得比赛而互相竞争。
english: The two jockeys are competing to win the race

chinese: 几.脆弱，弱点
一旦蛋壳开始破裂，它就会变得十分脆弱。
english: The vulnerability of an eggshell is clear once it begins to crack

chinese: ad）. 在空中的
他正看着空中的那架飞机。
english: He is looking at the airplane that is airborne
